name: Get to Work!
description:
A game built for Ludum Dare 42 game jam to the theme of "Running out of Space"

A game where you stack boxes to appease your corporate overlords. You started your first day working at a sorting warehouse, and it's your job to organize products on shelves as accurately and fast as you can so you don't lose your job. 

---------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Left Click - Drag and Drop boxes to the bins

Right Click - Rotate the box for the best fit

F1 (Windows Only) - Fullscreen

Esc (Windows Only) - Close Game

---------------------------------------------------------
